items.name: Scalpel
items.description:
This instrument is used to cut 
 the skin to make open wound.

items.name: What are we going to do?
items.description:
We are going to cut the patient's 
skin with the scalpel.

items.name: Retractor
items.description:
This instrument is used to keep 
the wound open.

items.name: What are we going to do?
items.description:
We are going to put the retractor
 on the open wound so we can
 keep it open.

items.name: Osteotome
items.description:
This instrument is used 
 to break the rib cage.

items.name: What are we going to do?
items.description:
We are going to break throught
 the rib cage with the osteotome.

items.name: Scalpel
items.description:
This instrument is used 
 to cut the arteries and
 the veins.

items.name: What are we going to do?
items.description:
We are going to cut the veins 
and arteries to work on 
replacing the heart.

items.name: Heart
items.description:
This is the new heart to
 replace the sick heart.

items.name: What are we going to do?
items.description:
We are going to put the
 new heart in the right 
place and sew it up.

items.name: Needle
items.description:
The needle is used 
to sew the open wound.

items.name: What are we going to do?
items.description:
We are going to sew the
 open wound and be good to go.
